attributes.action: Repatriate British Citizens from Israel and Gaza
attributes.additional_details: Other countries such as Germany, Australia and France have all begun efforts to repatriate their citizens, the UK government must do the same. British Airways have suspended all flights due to safety concerns, if the British Government doesn't act soon then their citizens may get trapped in a war zone indefinitely. Friends and family are very concerned about their loves ones.
attributes.background: The war between Hamas & Israel is escalating every day. British Citizens in Israel & Gaza are struggling to get home to the UK. Routes out are either inaccessible, blocked, dangerous or flights are being continuously cancelled. We call on the British Government to repatriate their citizens.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition the Government has facilitated flights for British nationals leaving Israel and Gaza. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-government-continues-to-facilitate-british-nationals-leaving-israel-and-gaza
